author: John Parrish

review: My son and I love it.  Nice to have the Apps I want on my screen television without having to go through the blu ray player.
author: Natasha Williamson

review: This device is definitely for someone who want to turn their regular flat screen into a smart TV.  One thing it doesn't show here is the power cable you need to attach to it so make sure you have a power source near by.  On top of the regular Netflix and amazon prime setup, there is a series of other media sources but on top of that you have music as well as video games which I didn't see that coming.  Overall its more than I expected.  But its not as good as the amazon fire TV.
